description: Standalone lotro client with DXVK and Esync enabled
notes:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=3&v=kH5zCrJ4PGA

This guide is inspired by the guide 'LOTRO on Linux: A Modern Guide (2019)', posted by Webgiant on the LotRO forums. Check out that guide here: https://www.lotro.com/forums/showthre...)

Winetricks terminal command: 
WINEPREFIX=~/Games/lotro winetricks d3dcompiler_43 d3dx11_42 d3dx11_43 winhttp corefonts
(Make sure to edit the WINEPREFIX location to where you've installed the game)

Reddit post on how to get DX11 working: https://www.reddit.com/r/SteamPlay/co...
A big thanks to /u/tolinbran for the hard work!

d3dcompiler_42.verb terminal commands:
cd Documents
WINEPREFIX=~/Games/lotro winetricks d3dcompiler_42.verb

Afterwards, the game should work as it does in Windows.

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/StandingStoneGames/The Lord of the Rings Online/TurbineLauncher.exe

task.description: Setting Windows version to Visual C++ 2017
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- lotro_installer: http://content.turbine.com/sites/clientdl/lotro/lotrolive.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/StandingStoneGames/The Lord of the Rings Online/TurbineLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    description: Setting Windows version to Visual C++ 2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    description: Setting Windows version to Windows10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: --mode unattended
    executable: lotro_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: lutris-4.13-x86_64
